snippet.title: Shake Spears! Game official trailer
snippet.description:
Shakes Spears is a game of GLORY, HONOR, and FAME! Take out opponents with well-aimed strikes in this knightly competition of strategy and precision! Only a steady hand, a strong horse and a dash of magic can guarantee your victory! Will you answer the call of destiny to become the most honored knight in the land? THEN SHAKE YOUR SPEAR!

Now available for Android, iPhone, iPod touch and iPad on the App Store and Google Play .

FOLLOW US: www.twitter.com/AlawarMobile
Be the first to hear about our new games and awesome contests!
